attrs.name: hit
attrs.desc: Whether there is a border stroke
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: color
attrs.desc: Color. The value can be in rgb, rgba, or hex format. Background color

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Display type; The value of this attribute can be success / info / warning / danger

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Size; The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini

attrs.name: effect
attrs.desc: Subject; The optional values of this attribute are dark / light / plain
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is light.

events.name: close
events.desc: This event is triggered when a tag is disabled. event: Native event

events.name: click
events.desc: This event is triggered when a tag is clicked. event: Native event
